name: rawdesignr
overview:
rawdesignr is a Chicago based mobile app development firm. Our goal is to build iPhone, Android & HTML5 mobile apps for startups.

Their employees range from self proclaimed web nerds who have subscribed to every social media site imaginable, to the more experienced designers and developers who have a unique web specialty.

We pride ourselves on our delivery methodology, hard work ethic and communication skills. We incorporate strategic creative alliances for several projects that we can utilize depending on the needs of the client. Together, our goal is to create a website that can be easily adapted to reflect the changing needs of your organization.

They guarantee that their work will always be of the highest quality and delivered on-time. They are very dedicated working company, and will do their absolute best to deliver exactly what the client needs. They run every project with passion and dedication. Every delivery phase will be followed closely, and they will work with the client to understand the exact design and coding requirements. They always go above and beyond what is needed

They are a delivery focused organization and we believe in our overall methodology: Design, Develop, Delivr.
